content: **crochet cloths with textured pattern for christmas the piece is worked in drops cotton light ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no cluster-082 yarn group b ----------------------------------------------------------- measurements approx 20 x 20 cm / 8 x 8 materials drops cotton light from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100 g color 18 pink 100 g color 32 red 100 g color 17 dark red 100 g color 12 khaki the piece can also be crocheted with yarn from alternative yarn yarn group b see link below drops crochet hook size 3 mm / c or the size needed to get 22 double crochets and 11 row on 10 cm / 4 in width and 10 cm / 4 in height
